name: Add new Gigrove orders to Google Sheets as new rows
description:
Every time a new order is created in your Gigrove, Integormat will add a row with information on that order in your Google Sheets.
To assure that the scenario works properly we have created a (sample table)[https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1LVus3joqlqvgFLY5npPIethcxjxaw0is-cOj6q2STeA/edit?usp=sharing] in Google Sheets so that you could use it when creating yours.
